title: MCP CLI - Model Context Provider Command Line Interface
description: A powerful, feature-rich command-line interface for interacting with Model Context Provider servers. This client enables seamless communication with LLMs through integration with the [CHUK-MCP protocol library](https://github.com/chrishayuk/chuk-mcp) which is a pyodide compatible pure python protocol implementation of MCP, supporting tool usage, conversation management, and multiple operational modes.
